ej,kresr101,C,mageg901,Time-out call $Bill Rigney singled but Dick Whitman had requested time to get his sun glasses; time had been granted before the pitch; HP umpire George Magerkurth disallowed the hit and the Giants complained; Giants Coach Red Kress ejected by Magerkurth; Giants manager Mel Ott protested the game

$HP umpire George Magerkurth called full count pitch to Carl Furillo ball 4, but 1B umpire Bill Stewart signaled Furillo had swung so Magerkurth reversed himself and called Furillo out; Dodgers manager Leo Durocher argued
$390 feet
$Billy Herman pulled up lame at 3B
Fischer officially only 2 Ks as is NYT box One BRO B 1 K high but is Whitman whom Fischer did not K
$Sometime late in game Mickey Witek ran into the wall chasing a foul; he left with an injured arm
$the throw hit 2B umpire George Magerkurth
Blattner failed to cover second on throw from Carden
Rucker says he made a shoe-string catch, but 3B ump Barr rules he trapped the ball; Giants complain

ej,bartd101,P,boggd901,Interference call $Buddy Blattner called out for interference for running into his own batted ball; Giants argued the ball was foul and Coach Dick Bartell came in from the third base coaching box to argue and was ejected by HP umpire Dusty Boggess
Kerr caught ball with back to infield
Hopp hit in head is dazed but walks to bench
$Monte Kennedy called for interference for running into his own bunt
Musial holds ball thinking Kerr is out
$Eddie Miller's throw struck Johnny Mize
